abstract: The primary public television station in Orlando, Fla., WMFE-TV, announced Friday that the station was being sold to an undisclosed buyer.
snippet: The primary public television station in Orlando, Fla., WMFE-TV, announced Friday that the station was being sold to an undisclosed buyer.
lead_paragraph: 6:25 p.m. | Updated The primary public television station in Orlando, Fla., WMFE-TV, said Friday that the station was being sold to an undisclosed buyer, in a sign of the continuing financial strains in public broadcasting.

headline.main: With Sale, Orlando Station to Leave PBS
